parameters.pythonCode:
item = _input.first().json title = item.get('title', 'Untitled') url = item.get('url', '') summary = item.get('summary', 'No summary') topic = item.get('topic', 'other') priority = item.get('priority', 3) tags = item.get('suggested_tags', []) # Build email body body = f'

{title}

\n' body += f'

{summary}

\n' if url: body += f'

View original

\n' body += f'

{topic} · priority {priority} · {", ".join(tags)}

\n' subject = f'[Automate] {topic}: {title[:60]}' return [{ 'json': { 'email_subject': subject, 'email_body': body, 'title': title, } }]

nodes.name: Send Email
Discard Quietly
nodes.notes:
Low-priority personal content. No action needed.
Bookmark gets deleted by the extension response in workflow 05.
Email newsletters get archived by cleanup in workflow 05.
